entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:34 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 01:46 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
